item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by Thomas L. Friedman
item.description: "Almost all the students who make it to Caltech, one of the best scientific universities in the world, come from public schools. So it can be done. " -- Thomas L. Friedman

item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by Wade Davis
item.description: "The world in which you were born is just one model of reality. Other cultures are not failed attempts at being you; they are unique manifestations of the human spirit." -- Wade Davis

item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by Jared Diamond
item.description: "History followed different courses for different peoples because of differences among peoples' environments, not because of biological differences among peoples themselves" -- Jared Diamond

item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Political language is designed to make lies sound truthful and murder respectable, and to give an appearance of solidity to pure wind. " -- George Orwell

item.title: Rex Michael add a quote by Chinua Achebe
item.description: "If you don't like someone's story, write your own." -- Chinua Achebe
